text: Need Skylar Collins for Amart Furniture campaign. Budget around $2,891, looking for 1 x Instagram post, 1 x Twitter post, 1 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x Instagram post, 2 x Pinterest pin. 5 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs January 2026. Usage rights for 11 months. Engagement period: 2 months.
